Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Establishes the division of the crime victims' statewide advocate to represent crime victims' legal interests
Summary: Establishes the division of the crime victims' statewide advocate to represent crime victims' and witnesses' legal interests during discovery and trial and assist with victim compensation applications.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the division of the crime victims' statewide advocate to represent crime victims' legal interests
